TopicTitle: one VAB high bay for rent

Articles.Content:
[http://www.nasaspaceflight.com/2015/06/available-one-vab-high-bay-three-mlp/](http://www.nasaspaceflight.com/2015/06/available-one-vab-high-bay-three-mlp/)

honestly, is there a more kerbal way to live? your own VAB-processing facility ([with its own weather inside](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vehicle_Assembly_Building#Construction), and its own [wikipedia article](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vehicle_Assembly_Building), even mentioning the weather), 3 MLPs in the garage, 2 for the shuttle, 1 for ares I. okay, they are not allowed on the street, but who cares? 

that's way cooler than having a headquarter in a [volcano](https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/588144086755999744) ;-)

besides, it's inside a nature preservation area, no nosy neighbors, and it's very quiet. the neighbors usually schedule their parties.

who wants to rent it?

EDIT: there are occasionally fireworks, not related to silvester or independence day ;-)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-18T10:11:56Z" title="06/18/2015 10:11  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 18, 2015</time> by Hotblack Desiato**
H\*ll yeah that looks super boss! Now all I need are the tynes to afford it... as well as the means of getting all the way over there...

Maybe the every person in the KSP community could chip in a buck or two and we all could set up a huge KSP room. We could play KSP DMP on NASA's computers and colonize Laythe! The possibilities are endless! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Maybe the every person in the KSP community could chip in a buck or two and we all could set up a huge KSP room. We could play KSP DMP on NASA's computers and colonize Laythe! The possibilities are endless! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

OOOOOOOOOOO idea! Get some awesome music, as well as an announcer and volunteers. Each volunteer uses BD armoury to build a fighter jet or land vehicle. After that, it's a free for all!!!

Wow, that'd be awesome. Too bad it's probably not ever gonna happen [i will find a way!]

> 
> Sorry, but;

It's nothing some "special" papers can't do.

I kid, I kid. But good on them for putting that restriction so that a gaggle of people like us don't rent the place out and go running amuck playing a silly video game all the time in what is a place of history, tradition, technology, dignity, and respect. I'd rather such a place go to rocket building anyway, that's what she's built for and what she does best.
We finally have a use to know all of this math.
XD! It's even called ksc this is amazing! You know how people say live o'naturalel? O'kerbalel

> 
> so, how much is it?

If you have to ask...

> 
> Sorry, but;
> 
> > 
> > NASA will not consider proposals for non-aerospace use of the VAB or MLPs or those that do not otherwise contribute to enabling the commercial use of space.

Building a headquarters for my secret base to takeover the world DOES contribute to the commercialization of space, given I plan on making a moon base which hence would require multiple rocket loads of illegal immigrants to do the labour at half the cost.

I think we are all looking at this the wrong way. Residency is not really the answer. 

But, what about a LAN party? Given that Squad has already been contacted by NASA via twitter before maybe we could convince Squad to ask on our behalf. Then a community planned event with local outreach as well as prizes, exposure, that sorta thing maybe all proceeds outside operating cost go to NASA funding or some kind of space research? I think that idea sounds pretty cool. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
